title: Reduced: T206 lot of 12 inc's (2) Frank Chance

posts.post_title: Reduced: T206 lot of 12 inc's (2) Frank Chance
posts.post_content:
Not a bad looking group, but a couple do show some signs of being enjoyed more than the others. [STRIKE]$195 bucks [/STRIKE] $120 delivered takes the entire lot of all (12) cards. Payment via PayPal A-Okay with no added fee. Please email me if you like em'.

Thank you,
Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
